item.title: The Art of Consciously Understanding Your Self-Worth: 1
item.description: Hey! Hope you’re doing well and keeping safe. I’ve been in a non-active mode for a while.

item.title: Bolbachhans: The Braggers, Not Doers
item.description: I hail from a small village in Gujarat and was allowed to pursue further studies as a meritorious female student.

item.title: Cloudy Conversation with the Self
item.description: Ups and downs, rise and fall, pick and pit, highest and lowest, whatever you name, are life’s inevitable parts.
